means: <美口>笨人，迟钝的人，易上当受骗的人

sentence.Network_en: He pitied the poor schnook cleaning tables in the coffee shop.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为那个在咖啡店清理桌子的笨蛋感到可怜.

PerfectNetExp.abs: schnook ,中国百科网... schnook 翻译中文意思|用法|音标| schnook: [ ' nuk ] n. 笨人,迟钝的人英英解释: 名词schnook:1. (Yiddish) a gullible simpleton.

list.abs: poor schnook was last seen with your bug lady ...可怜的笨蛋最后被看到与你的虫虫女士在一起.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: perhaps from German Schnucke 'small sheep' or from Yiddish shnuk 'snout'

means.word_mean: 1. (Yiddish) a gullible simpleton more to be pitied than despisedi;
